meanings.definition: To cover or mix with clay.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys claying her pottery to give it a smooth finish.
meanings.sent2: The artist is claying the sculpture to add intricate details.
meanings.sent3: After claying the vase, she accidentally left fingerprints all over it.
meanings.sent4: The children were claying the walls with mud during their playtime.
meanings.sent5: Claying the bricks together tightly, he built a sturdy wall.

meanings.definition: The act of applying clay to something.
meanings.sent1: The claying of the mask was done carefully to avoid any cracks.
meanings.sent2: She learned the art of claying in her ceramics class.
meanings.sent3: The claying of the cake with fondant made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The claying of the pot transformed it into a beautiful piece of pottery.
meanings.sent5: His claying of the model resulted in a lifelike sculpture.

meanings.definition: The process of shaping or molding clay.
meanings.sent1: The claying of the figure required precision and skill.
meanings.sent2: She demonstrated the claying of the clay into various shapes.
meanings.sent3: The claying of the dough for the cookies was a messy but fun task.
meanings.sent4: His claying of the vase produced a unique and elegant design.
meanings.sent5: The claying of the mask revealed intricate patterns and textures.
